publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2884 Mr Andy Kerr: Scottish Qualifications Authority Bill: Financial Resolution-That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Scottish Qualifications Authority Bill, agrees to the following expenditure out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund- expenditure of the Scottish Ministers in consequence of the Act; and (b) increases attributable to the Act in the sums payable out of that Fund under any other enactment. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson*, Nicol Stephen*, Peter Peacock*
